title: create save and edit forms using drag and drop builder
description: Verify that users can create, save, and edit forms successfully using the drag-and-drop form builder interface without encountering errors.

title: render all supported field types correctly on frontend
description: Ensure that all supported field types including text, email, file upload, and date picker render correctly on the frontend and accept valid input while enforcing validation rules.

title: process form submissions securely with validation and sanitization
description: Test that form submissions are processed securely with nonce validation, input sanitization, and protection against SQL injection and XSS attacks.

title: perform real time crm synchronization with mailchimp and hubspot
description: Validate that CRM integrations with Mailchimp and HubSpot perform real-time contact synchronization, handle field mapping correctly, and manage API errors gracefully.

title: meet wcag 2 1 aa accessibility standards
description: Verify that the plugin's accessibility features comply with WCAG 2.1 AA standards including screen reader support, keyboard navigation, ARIA labels, focus management, and high contrast mode.

title: prevent spam submissions using recaptcha and honeypot
description: Test that spam protection mechanisms such as reCAPTCHA v2/v3 and honeypot fields effectively prevent automated spam submissions.

title: send email notifications with customizable templates and smtp
description: Ensure that email notifications are sent correctly using customizable email templates and SMTP settings upon form submission.

title: maintain plugin admin interface functionality and state
description: Verify that the WordPress admin interface for managing forms, submissions, and plugin settings functions correctly and maintains state across user sessions.

title: optimize performance for load times and memory usage
description: Test that performance optimizations such as database query caching, asset optimization, lazy loading, and memory management improve load times and reduce memory usage compared to baseline.

title: respond correctly to hooks and filters for customization
description: Validate that the plugin's hooks and filters respond correctly to customizations and do not break core functionality or integrations.
